language.entry: Cure &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 2/&amp;amp;amp;gt; bleed &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 3/&amp;amp;amp;gt;/&amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 4/&amp;amp;amp;gt; blight &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 5/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 6/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 7/&amp;amp;amp;gt; Heal &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 8/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 30% max hp &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 9/&amp;amp;amp;gt;-100% &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 10/&amp;amp;amp;gt; deathdoor &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 11/&amp;amp;amp;gt; сопротивление &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 12/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt; (m id 14/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;gt; (MID = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt; (MID = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m Id = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 13/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id.

清除 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 17/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 流血 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 18/&amp;amp;amp;gt;/&amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 19/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 腐蚀 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 20/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 21/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 22/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 治疗 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 23/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 30% 最大生命 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 24/&amp;amp;amp;gt;-100% &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 25/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 濒死 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 26/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 抗性 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 27/&amp;amp;amp;gt; &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 28/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 濒死 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 26/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 抗性 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 28/&amp;amp;amp;gt; (m id = 28/&amp;amp;amp;gt; (m id = 26/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 抗性 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 28/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 濒死 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 26/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 抗性 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 28/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 濒死 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 26/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 抗性 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 28/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 濒死 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 26/&amp;amp;amp;gt; 抗性 &amp;amp;amp;lt;m id = 27/&amp;amp;amp;gt;.
